short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A legendary live wallpaper featuring Superman and his companion against a stunning world scenery.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring your Chrome to life with this extension! Enjoy a beautiful world view with Superman and his little companion as the centerpiece, complemented by a search bar, shortcuts to popular sites, and up-to-date date and time information. We wish you a delightful experience with our extension!
